sentences_examples.sentence_zh: 他讲了一个很好笑的笑话。
sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Tā jiǎng le yī gè hěn hǎoxiào de xiàohua.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Il a raconté une blague très drôle.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: He told a very funny joke.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Tā zhòngjiǎng le!
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Il a gagné à la loterie !
sentences_examples.sentence_en: He won a prize!

sentences_examples.sentence_zh: 我们要避免犯同样的错误。
sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Wǒmen yào bìmiǎn fàn tóngyàng de cuòwù.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Nous devons éviter de faire la même erreur.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: We must avoid making the same mistake.

sentences_examples.sentence_zh: 他一再强调这件事的重要性。
sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Tā yīzài qiángdiào zhè jiàn shì de zhòngyàoxìng.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Il a souligné à plusieurs reprises l'importance de cette affaire.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: He repeatedly emphasized the importance of this matter.

sentences_examples.sentence_zh: 这个房间有二十平方米。
sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Zhège fángjiān yǒu èrshí píngfāng mǐ.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Cette pièce fait vingt mètres carrés.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: This room is twenty square meters.

sentences_examples.sentence_zh: 长城是中国的文化遗产。
sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Chángchéng shì Zhōngguó de wénhuà yíchǎn.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: La Grande Muraille est un patrimoine culturel chinois.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: The Great Wall is China's cultural heritage.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Qǐng fùzhì zhè fèn wénjiàn.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Veuillez copier ce document.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: Please copy this document.

sentences_examples.sentence_zh: 我们要把注意力转移到其他事上。
sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Wǒmen yào bǎ zhùyìlì zhuǎnyí dào qítā shì shàng.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Nous devons détourner notre attention vers d'autres choses.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: We need to shift our attention to other things.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Wǒ wàng le dài chōngdiànqì.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: J'ai oublié d'apporter mon chargeur.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: I forgot to bring my charger.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Zhège yóuxì tài cìjī le.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Ce jeu est trop excitant.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: This game is too exciting.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Qǐng kàn yīxià rìlì.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Regardez le calendrier.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: Please look at the calendar.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Tā dānrèn gōngsī de zǒngjīnglǐ.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Il occupe le poste de directeur général de l'entreprise.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: He serves as the general manager of the company.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Tā chéngrèn le zìjǐ de cuòwù.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Il a admis son erreur.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: He admitted his mistake.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Zhèlǐ jìnzhǐ chōuyān.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Il est interdit de fumer ici.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: Smoking is prohibited here.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Tā tài cūxīn le, zǒngshì chūcuò.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Il est trop négligent, il fait toujours des erreurs.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: He is too careless, always making mistakes.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Qǐng gǎizhèng nǐ de cuòwù.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Corrige ton erreur.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: Please correct your mistake.

sentences_examples.sentence_zh: 天气预报说明天会降温。
sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Tiānqì yùbào shuō míngtiān huì jiàngwēn.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: La météo dit que la température baissera demain.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: The weather forecast says it will cool down tomorrow.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Zhè cì tóuzī de shōuyì hěn hǎo.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Le rendement de cet investissement est très bon.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: The return on this investment is very good.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Kànlái tā jīntiān bù huì lái le.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Il semble qu'il ne viendra pas aujourd'hui.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: It seems he won't come today.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Tā jīntiān de zàoxíng hěn piàoliang.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Son look d'aujourd'hui est très joli.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: Her look today is very pretty.
